department: Department of Computer Science and Engineering
name: COD494 B.Tech. Project Part-II
description: The student(s) who work on a project are expected to work towards the goals and milestones set in COD492. At the end there would be a demonstration of the solution and possible future work on the same problem. A dissertation outlining the entire problem, including a survey of literature and the various results obtained along with their solutions is expected to be produced.
